scripts.build: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$items=@(); foreach($p in @('app','app.js','env','public','package.json','README.md')) { if(Test-Path $p){ $items += $p }}; if($items.Count -eq 0){ Write-Error 'No files to archive'; exit 1 }; if(-Not (Test-Path -Path build)){New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path build | Out-Null}; Compress-Archive -Path $items -DestinationPath 'build/server-build.zip' -Force; Write-Host 'Created build/server-build.zip'"
